alert.note: Alert for Cascade County below 5000ft; Fergus County below 4500ft; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Western and Central Chouteau County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 4:47PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Meagher, northern Judith Basin, west central Fergus, south central Chouteau and eastern Cascade Counties through 545 PM MDT... At 447 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles north of Belt to 18 miles west of Geyser to 34 miles west of Stanford. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Stanford, Belt, Geraldine, Geyser, Highwood, Raynesford, Windham, Monarch, Sluice Boxes State Park, Utica, Coffee Creek, Armington, Square Butte and Benchland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cascade County below 5000ft; Fergus County below 4500ft; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Western and Central Chouteau County
